name: I wanna Reach the TOP
description:
Reach the top

I wanna reach the top is a tower climbing platformer game. Start from the bottom, the goal is to reach the top of the tower, by launching/jumping yourself up one step after another in a ragdoll pose.

Plan your jumps

The tower is composed by a lot of different buildings and platforms, you'll have to plan your own route to the top of the tower.

NPCs

And you'll meet different weirdos alone your journey, with wired conservations.

Fall

You will probably fall a lot during the process of trying to get to the next taller spot. Plan your route to the top, the next move, be patience, don't let it get to you.

Ragdoll

Your character will have no animation, ragdoll the way up to the top of the tower. And it's just hilarious to watch your character struggling.
